variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: MHX1
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? High blood pressure or hypertension

variable.name: MHX2
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Heart attack

variable.name: MHX4
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Heart failure or congestive heart failure

variable.name: MHX5
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Diabetes (sugar in blood)

variable.name: MHX6
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Chronic lung disease, such as bronchitis or emphysema

variable.name: MHX7
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Asthma

variable.name: MHX8
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Cancer

variable.name: MHX9
variable.description: Have you ever had any of the following? Coronary (or heart) bypass surgery

variable.name: MHX11
variable.description: Have you ever had any of the following? Coronary (or heart) angioplasty

variable.name: MHX13
variable.description: Have you ever had any of the following? Endarterectomy, that is, an operation on a carotid artery in your neck

variable.name: MHX15
variable.description: Have you ever had any of the following? Heart valve surgery

variable.name: MHX16
variable.description: Have you ever had any of the following? Pace maker implant

variable.name: MHX17
variable.description: NYHA classification of cardiac status
variable.value: IV Unable to carry on any physical activity without symptoms

variable.name: MHX18
variable.description: Is the patient currently on dialysis?

variable.name: MHX19
variable.description: Is the patient currently being treated for anemia?

variable.name: MHX19A
variable.description: Is patient male or female?

variable.name: MHX20
variable.description: Have you had surgery that prevents pregnancy, that is, a tubal ligation?

variable.name: MHX21
variable.description: Have you reached menopause, that is, quit having menstrual periods?

variable.name: MHX22
variable.description: Was your menopause natural or the result of surgery or radiation?

variable.name: MHX23
variable.description: Have you ever smoked cigarettes?

variable.name: MHX24
variable.description: Do you now smoke cigarettes?

variable.name: MHX28A
variable.description: Please tell me if you are currently or have ever used: Pipe/cigars/ cigarillos

variable.name: MHX28B
variable.description: Please tell me if you are currently or have ever used: Chewing tobacco

variable.name: MHX28C
variable.description: Please tell me if you are currently or have ever used: Snuff

variable.name: MHX28D
variable.description: Please tell me if you are currently or have ever used: Nicotine gum or patch

variable.name: MHX34
variable.description: Cervical bruit

variable.name: MHX44
variable.description: Code number of person performing the exam

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: MHX25
variable.description: How many cigarettes do you smoke per day?

variable.name: MHX26
variable.description: Prior to quitting, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke per day?

variable.name: MHX27
variable.description: How many years have you (for current smokers) or did you (for ex-smokers) smoke cigarettes?

variable.name: MHX29
variable.description: Height (inches)

variable.name: MHX30
variable.description: Weight (pounds)

variable.name: MHX31
variable.description: Resting heart rate (beats per minute)

variable.name: MHX32A
variable.description: First sitting blood pressure measurement: Systolic

variable.name: MHX32B
variable.description: First sitting blood pressure measurement: Diastolic

variable.name: MHX33A
variable.description: Second sitting blood pressure measurement: Systolic

variable.name: MHX33B
variable.description: Second sitting blood pressure measurement: Diastolic

variable.name: MHX35A
variable.description: Vitamin B12 (pmol/L)

variable.name: MHX35B
variable.description: Local laboratory's lower limit of normal Vit B12 (pmol/L)

variable.name: MHX36A
variable.description: Patient's level of creatinine (mg/dL)

variable.name: MHX36B
variable.description: Local laboratory's upper limit for normal creatinine (mg/dL)

variable.name: MHX37
variable.description: Total cholesterol (mg/dL)

variable.name: MHX38
variable.description: HDL cholesterol (mg/dL)

variable.name: MHX39
variable.description: Triglyceride (mg/dL)

variable.name: MHX40
variable.description: LDL cholesterol

variable.name: MHX42A
variable.description: Patient's uric acid level (mg/dL)

variable.name: MHX42B
variable.description: Local laboratory's upper limit of normal uric acid level (mg/dL)

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: MHX41FUT
variable.description: Date of lipid profile

variable.name: MHX43FUT
variable.description: Date of exam and interview

variable.name: MHX35CFT
variable.description: Date of vitamin B12 determination

variable.name: MHX36CFT
variable.description: Date of creatinine determination

variable.name: MHX42CFT
variable.description: Date of uric acid determination

variable.name: MHX3YR
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Date of latest heart attack

variable.name: MHX10YR
variable.description: Year of coronary or heart bypass surgery

variable.name: MHX12YR
variable.description: Have you ever had any of the following? Date of angioplasty

variable.name: MHX14YR
variable.description: Have you ever had any of the following? Date of most recent endarterectomy

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
